column2: caption="Ailinel of Númenor" by [[:Category:Images by Elawen Altariel

column3: [ˈa͡ɪlinel]}}, stem ''Ailinell-'') was the second of the three children of [[Tar-Meneldur]] and [[Almarian]] of [[Númenor]].  Her older brother [[Tar-Aldarion
column4: Aldarion]] later became King [[Tar-Aldarion]]; her younger sister was [[Almiel]].<ref name="Early">{{UT
column5: earlier}}</ref>  Ailinel married [[Orchaldor]], who was descended from the [[House of Hador]] and they had a son named [[Soronto]].<ref name="Wife">{{UT

column1: Ailinel's name appears to incorporate one of the [[Quenya]] words for "lake", ''[[ailin]]'', and the feminine suffix ''[[-el]]''.
